benchmark_details.name: PROduct CLArifyingREtrieval (PROCLARE)
benchmark_details.overview: This paper introduces the PROCLARE benchmark to evaluate the performance of a conversational product search agent, ProductAgent, designed to clarify user demands through dialog and strategic questioning.

purpose_and_intended_users.goal: To provide an automatic evaluation framework for conversational product demand clarification agents.
purpose_and_intended_users.limitations: The benchmark relies on a user simulation technique, lacking direct human user interaction.

data.source: Produced by simulating dialogues between a user simulator and the ProductAgent.
data.annotation: Automatically generated via an LLM-driven user simulator.

methodology.calculation: Calculated based on the retrieved product relevance after each dialog turn.
methodology.interpretation: Higher MRR and Hit Rate values indicate better performance in guiding users to relevant products.
methodology.validation: Evaluated against traditional information retrieval benchmarks.
